clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Determine the Long-Term Safety, Tolerability and Biological Activity of UshStat® in Patients With Usher Syndrome Type 1B
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label Study to Determine the Long-Term Safety, Tolerability and Biological Activity of UshStat® in Patients With Usher Syndrome Type 1B

brief_summary.textblock:
Primary Objective:
To evaluate the long-term safety and tolerability of UshStat® in patients with Usher syndrome type 1B
Secondary Objective:
To assess long-term safety and biological activity of UshStat®

primary_outcome.time_frame: During the first 5 years of follow up, every six months, then on an annual basis for a subsequent 10 years
primary_outcome.description: The number and percentage of patients with treatment emergent adverse events.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in ocular safety assessments
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the first 5 years of follow up, every six months, then on an annual basis for a subsequent 10 years
secondary_outcome.description: Best Corrected Visual Acuity (BCVA), Slit-lamp, Funduscopy, Intraocular Pressure, Lab parameters, concomitant meds

secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the first 5 years of follow up, every six months, then on an annual basis for a subsequent 10 years
secondary_outcome.description: Measured as change from baseline in function relative to untreated contralateral eye on: BCVA, kinetic, static perimetry, microperimetry, autofluorescence, ERG, OCT

arm_group.description: Long-term follow up of patients who received UshStat in a previous study

intervention.description: Long-term follow up of patients who received UshStat in a previous study

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Provide signed and dated written informed consent (and if appropriate assent) and any locally required authorization eg, Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA).
- Must have been enrolled in Protocol TDU13600
- Must have received a subretinal injection of UshStat®
Exclusion Criteria:
- Did not receive UshStat® as part of the TDU13600 protocol
